metadata.title: CVE-2017-16869 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** p_mach.cpp in UPX 3.94 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (invalid memory access and application crash) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via a crafted Mach-O file, related to canPackand unpack functions. NOTE: the vendor has stated "there is no securityimplication whatsoever."

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
